TopicTitle: Kerbal Space program (new version) crashes upon launch

Articles.Content: I had this issue for hours, I have done everything from verifying the files integrity via steam, reinstalling it, restarting my computer, and updating my graphics driver. Just everything

Hello, and welcome to the KSP forum.

Please read this guide on how to get support, it explains what information you should provide to make it easier for others to help you:

Log files are going to be necessary so follow that guide to find them, upload them to a file sharing site then put a link to them here.
A few key questions- where did you download KSP from? What version are you using? Operating system and specs of your PC? Where exactly does it stop loading? (Screenshots would help here).

Does it crash after getting to the main menu? I am having a crash which I can avoid if I'm really quick and close the update message. You have to be ready for it to finish loading and then immediately click "close" or whatever the button is labelled to dismiss the message about the update (no time to even click "don't show this again" first).
